participant_1.name: Alex Thompson
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and laid-back, Alex prefers substance over style and enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Jordan finds inspiration in the arts and enjoys sharing his passions with others.
participant_2.background: i enjoy poetry. i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i played football for a division a college.
